messages.subject: Re: New  Humor
messages.msgSnippet: I love it ^_^ we need to add small screencaps of Gohatto too...if I could drawn in Illustrator (absolutely no skill with the mouse) I would draw silhouettes of
messages.messageBody:
I love it ^_^
we need to add small screencaps of Gohatto too...if I could drawn in
Illustrator (absolutely no skill with the mouse) I would draw
silhouettes of PMK Hijikata and RK Saitou
it's good that they missed Sword of Doom...
Hijikata (fuming) "did Ryunosuke just wipe out a couple of squads
during his insane rampage?"
Saitou "seems like it I must have been with Aioi Tayu that
night...I'll be sure to post a sign by the bridge tomorrow to get
some new recruits"

Behavin

messages.subject: New  Humor
messages.msgSnippet: Posted for your enjoyment in the files section of the Spy Division list and on the SHQ website  is a pretty darn amusing review/commentary of the film
messages.messageBody:
Posted for your enjoyment in the files section of the Spy Division list
and on the SHQ website is a pretty darn amusing "review/commentary" of
the film Gohatto a/k/a Taboo given by none other than PMK Hijikata and
RK Saitou.....(as captured via secret security camera by Miss Behavin
and BarbaraSheridan)

http://www.shinsengumihq.com/Shinsengumi_Theater.htm

--
Barbara Sheridan
